body.name: 6 Set Mini Dust Pan and Brush Set, Small Dustpan with Broom, Handheld Angle Broom and Dustpan Set for Home Room Kitchen Car Office Lobby Indoor Floor Cleaning
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 17 mins
features: Mini Dustpan and Brush Set: the package comes with 6 small broom and dustpan sets, which are sufficient for you to use in kitchens, gardens, offices, bathrooms, garages, yards and rooms, allowing you to clean the messes easily

Sturdy and Serviceable: made of reliable PP material, the dust pan is solid and long lasting, and the brushes with dense bristles are convenient to sweep dirty and will not scratch floor or table surface; This mini broom and dustpan set adopts an ergonomic design with a non slip grip, and can give you a nice cleaning experience

Practical Cleaning Supplies: our hand broom and dustpan set with built in scrapers and combs can capture and clean dirt efficiently, such as most types of crumbs, pet hairs, leaves and dust; Also the dust pan has a wide lip, which can maximize contact with surfaces that need to be cleaned

Easy to Store: our dust pans with brush have holes, can be snapped directly together for compact and easy storage; You can hang them on the door or wall at the cabinet and kitchen, saving storing space and bringing you a lot of convenience

Multiple Purposes: the dustpan and brush set are ideal for cleaning dirt from beds, sofas, tables, furniture, countertops, shelves, keyboards, cabinets, drawers, shoe racks, pet cages and more, meeting your various cleaning demands
body.description: Features: Practical school cleaning supplies: These dust pans with brush are not utility family essentials, but also appropriate for schools, kindergartens and early education centers to use, providing children and students with some portable sweeping items to learn how to clean their room and tables, Useful presents: You can send the broom and dustpan to your neighbors, siblings and mates who are refurbishing their homes or rooms, which can make their cleaning work easier and more efficient. Specifications: Material: bristles, PP Color: as pictures show Size: Dust pan: 22.5 x 19 x 10 cm/ 8.86 x 7.48 x 3.94 inches Broom: Handle length: 28 cm/ 11.02 inches Height: 10 cm/ 3.94 inches Package includes: 6 Sets of mini dust pan and brush Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.
